languages.text: "А кто тебе сказал, что я что-то искупил? Я обрек на вырождение целую планету. Думаешь, пара десятилетий скитаний с миссией это исправят? Нет, в глазах Его я скверный пастырь".

traits.locale_text: "А кто тебе сказал, что я что-то искупил? Я обрек на вырождение целую планету. Думаешь, пара десятилетий скитаний с миссией это исправят? Нет, в глазах Его я скверный пастырь".

languages.text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."
languages.original_text: "А кто тебе сказал, что я что-то искупил? Я обрек на вырождение целую планету. Думаешь, пара десятилетий скитаний с миссией это исправят? Нет, в глазах Его я скверный пастырь".

traits.locale_text: "Who said I have redeemed myself in any way? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to amend that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

"Who said I have redeemed myself in any way? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to amend that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

"Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

"Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

"Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

languages.text: “谁说我已经赎完罪了？是我让那颗行星陷入了堕落。你以为，怀着使命流浪上一二十年，就足以赎罪了吗？不，在祂的眼里，我不过是个可鄙的罪人，仅仅是在对牧羊人有样学样罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

traits.locale_text: “谁说我已经赎完罪了？是我让那颗行星陷入了堕落。你以为，怀着使命流浪上一二十年，就足以赎罪了吗？不，在祂的眼里，我不过是个可鄙的罪人，仅仅是在对牧羊人有样学样罢了。”

languages.text: «¿Quién dice que yo me haya redimido? Condené a todo un planeta a la depravación: ¿de verdad cree que una década o dos errando con una misión bastan para expiarme? No, ante Su mirada, no soy más que un patético pastor».
languages.original_text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién dice que yo me haya redimido? Condené a todo un planeta a la depravación: ¿de verdad cree que una década o dos errando con una misión bastan para expiarme? No, ante Su mirada, no soy más que un patético pastor».

languages.text: 「私が救済されたですと？私は惑星全体を堕落に追いやったのです。10年や20年、伝道師として活動しただけで償いになると思いますか？皇帝の目から見れば、私は羊飼いを名乗るのもおこがましい存在です」
languages.original_text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

traits.locale_text: 「私が救済されたですと？私は惑星全体を堕落に追いやったのです。10年や20年、伝道師として活動しただけで償いになると思いますか？皇帝の目から見れば、私は羊飼いを名乗るのもおこがましい存在です」

languages.text: "Wer behauptet denn, ich wäre erlöst? Ich habe einen ganzen Planeten zum Verfall verurteilt. Denkt Ihr, ein oder zwei Jahrzehnte Wanderschaft auf Mission könnten das wiedergutmachen? Nein, ich bin in Seinen Augen ein überaus armseliger Schäfer."
languages.original_text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Wer behauptet denn, ich wäre erlöst? Ich habe einen ganzen Planeten zum Verfall verurteilt. Denkt Ihr, ein oder zwei Jahrzehnte Wanderschaft auf Mission könnten das wiedergutmachen? Nein, ich bin in Seinen Augen ein überaus armseliger Schäfer."

languages.text: « Qui vous dit que je me suis racheté ? J'ai condamné une planète entière à la dépravation. Vous pensez qu'il suffit de passer une décennie ou deux à voyager avec une mission pour expier ce genre de choses ? Non, je suis un bien piètre berger à Ses yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

traits.locale_text: « Qui vous dit que je me suis racheté ? J'ai condamné une planète entière à la dépravation. Vous pensez qu'il suffit de passer une décennie ou deux à voyager avec une mission pour expier ce genre de choses ? Non, je suis un bien piètre berger à Ses yeux. »

languages.text: "Günahlarımı telafi ettiğimi kim söyledi? Koca bir gezegenin yoldan çıkıp ölümüne sebep oldum. On yirmi yıl misyonerlik yapmam alnıma kazınan bu günahı silebilir mi sence? Hayır, ben O'nun gözünde zavallı bir çoban müsveddesiyim."
languages.original_text: "Who said I had redeemed myself? I doomed an entire planet to degeneracy. You think a decade or two of wandering with a mission is enough to atone for that? No, I am a poor excuse for a shepherd in His eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Günahlarımı telafi ettiğimi kim söyledi? Ben koca bir gezegenin yoldan çıkmasına ve ölmesine sebep oldum. On yıl veya yirmi yıl misyonerlik yapmanın bunu telafi edebileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Hayır, ben O'nun gözünde zavallı, işe yaramaz bir çobanım."
